repast.simphony.data2

Class FileDataSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • repast.simphony.data2.FileDataSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSink

    public class FileDataSink
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSink
    DataSink that writes data to a file in tabular format.
    Author:
    Nick Collier
